chunks.zh: 真爱是什么样的?
chunks.en: What is true love like?

chunks.zh: 事情是昨天晚上和一个认识的独立执业律师妹子聊天,说她的遇到好几个离婚的男客户.
chunks.en: The thing is, I was chatting with a female lawyer I know who works independently last night. She said she's encountered several divorced male clients.

chunks.zh: 都是人到中年 40 多岁认识一个女孩子发现是真爱,觉得之前的婚姻是没有爱情的只是觉得合适在一起,现在要离婚接受净身出户.
chunks.en: They are all middle-aged men in their 40s who met a young woman and discovered true love. They feel that their previous marriage lacked love and was just based on compatibility. Now they want to divorce and accept a clean break.

chunks.zh:
大家都劝客户说他不理智.

男客户大意:你们不懂什么是真爱, 在没有遇到女二之前也觉得世界上不存在真爱的.
chunks.en:
Everyone is advising the client that he is being irrational.

The male client's gist: You don't understand what true love is. Before meeting the second woman, I didn't think true love existed in the world.

chunks.zh:
大家喜欢的是一些特征的集合体无论是谁其实只要在这个"框架"内都是可以接受的.

我顺便问了下妹子她的想法:这件事对她的冲击很大,导致她之前有个相亲认识的都准备订婚了但她犹豫了,因为她发现自己也是这样只是在这个"框架"内她会找一个对她最好的人.
chunks.en:
What people like is a collection of certain traits. In fact, anyone is acceptable as long as they are within this 'framework'.

I also asked the girl what she thought: This matter had a big impact on her, causing her to hesitate about getting engaged to a man she met through a blind date because she realized that she was the same way. Within this 'framework,' she would find someone who is best for her.

chunks.zh: 至于爱情可能有但是时间久了也不好说.
chunks.en: As for love, maybe there is, but it's hard to say in the long run.

chunks.zh: 想草嫩批罢了
chunks.en: Just wants to fuck a young pussy.

chunks.zh: 什么真爱不过是为自己出轨和喜新厌旧找个借口。
chunks.en: What true love is, but just an excuse for cheating and liking the new and loathing the old.

chunks.zh: @Cheons 好看的只是想操她逼而已，见一个想操一个，但可能你操了她逼以后，拔了鸡巴以后离开了这个人你也不会伤心难过。
chunks.en: @Cheons Just wants to fuck her because she's pretty, wants to fuck every one he sees, but maybe after you fuck her and pull out your dick, you won't be sad when you leave this person.

chunks.zh: 真爱，我认为只是双方相处久了舍不得离不开，心理暗示自己爱她。
chunks.en: True love, I think, is just that the two people have been together for so long that they are reluctant to leave each other and can't leave each other. They mentally suggest to themselves that they love her.

chunks.zh: 真爱也可以是多人，和多个人相处久了，不仅仅只是操她们逼，都想和她们一起生活，结婚，生子，这个需要有财力支撑。
chunks.en: True love can also be multiple people. After being with multiple people for a long time, it's not just about fucking them, you want to live with them, get married, and have children. This requires financial support.

chunks.zh: （真爱男性视角）想和 ta 做爱，但是不做爱也愿意和 ta 在一起
chunks.en: (True love from a male perspective) Wants to have sex with them, but is also willing to be with them even without having sex.

chunks.zh: （真爱女性视角）想和 ta 在一起，愿意和 ta 做爱
chunks.en: (True love from a female perspective) Wants to be with them, and is willing to have sex with them.

chunks.zh: 普通人遇到满足一项的就可以结婚了
chunks.en: Ordinary people can get married when they meet one of these conditions.

chunks.zh: "大家喜欢的是一些特征的集合体无论是谁其实只要在这个"框架"内都是可以接受的"我一直是这种想法.
chunks.en: "What people like is a collection of certain traits. In fact, anyone is acceptable as long as they are within this 'framework'." I have always thought this way.

chunks.zh: 问，都是真爱。
chunks.en: Asked, all are true love.

chunks.zh: 难道就只有我，好看的见一个爱一个？
chunks.en: Is it just me who falls in love with every attractive person I see?

chunks.zh: 从哲学上来说，真爱的感觉就是对方在你心中的位置，大于或者等于你的意识的接受能力。
chunks.en: Philosophically speaking, the feeling of true love is that the other person's position in your heart is greater than or equal to your consciousness's acceptance capacity.

chunks.zh: 比如意识之门就是你家房门那么大，普通的事物不过共享这个空间从这里进出你的意识，但是那个“她”存在感过于强烈，把这个门堵塞了，也就是一叶障目不见泰山。
chunks.en: For example, the door of consciousness is as big as your house's door. Ordinary things just enter and exit your consciousness by sharing this space, but the presence of that 'she' is too strong, blocking this door, which is like being unable to see Mount Tai because a leaf is covering your eyes.

chunks.zh: 解决方法有且只有一个，接近相处后发现对方不过如此
chunks.en: There is only one solution: After getting close and spending time together, you realize that the other person is nothing special.

chunks.zh: 其实这种“追求真爱”的的行为应该在年轻的时候做完，发现自己的幻想过于幻想，从自己的幻梦中走出来，然后再去挑选合适的对象。
chunks.en: In fact, this kind of 'pursuit of true love' should be done when you are young. Discover that your fantasies are too fantastical, come out of your own dreams, and then go to choose a suitable partner.

chunks.zh: 另一种靠“合适”在一起的双方，大概率年轻时候就没有勇气做过什么“追求真爱”的行为，缺乏勇气的负面效应一直积累等中年后，然后压制不住突然爆发，属实自找的，为自己年轻时候的怂买单
chunks.en: Another type of couple who are together because they are 'suitable' probably didn't have the courage to do anything to 'pursue true love' when they were young. The negative effects of the lack of courage accumulate until middle age, and then they can't be suppressed and suddenly burst out, which is really self-inflicted, paying the price for their cowardice when they were young.

chunks.zh: 人会喜欢特定集合的人，这个确实没错，但是这个只是喜欢第一步。
chunks.en: It is true that people like people with specific collections, but this is only the first step of liking.

chunks.zh: 从喜欢的第一步、走到互相喜欢、走到婚姻、走到真正的合适（非你不可）、携手走到人生的终点，这个过程可不是特定集合里几个概念就可以实现的
chunks.en: From the first step of liking, to mutual liking, to marriage, to truly being suitable (irreplaceable), to walking hand in hand to the end of life, this process cannot be achieved by just a few concepts in a specific set.

chunks.zh: 真爱不需要婚姻，也跟离不离婚没关系
chunks.en: True love does not require marriage and has nothing to do with divorce.

chunks.zh: 我一远亲，长辈，女，跟一已婚男（早已分居，分居后认识的），相伴一生半个世纪，对方没离婚，他俩自然也没结婚
chunks.en: A distant relative of mine, an elder, a woman, spent half a century together with a married man (who had been separated for a long time, they met after the separation). The other party did not divorce, and they naturally did not marry.

chunks.zh: 原配家庭在远方，也没任何吵闹，默认直到男方病逝，遗产都归远方那妻子和孩子，我这远亲一分没得（当然相伴期间也是存了些婚外钱财的，但不多）
chunks.en: The original family was far away, and there was no quarreling. It was defaulted until the man died. The inheritance went to the wife and children in the distance, and my distant relative did not get a penny (of course, she also saved some extramarital money during their time together, but not much).

chunks.zh: 我听闻此事，感叹这是我无法理解的感情，是否真爱我也没法判断
chunks.en: When I heard about this, I sighed that this was an emotion I couldn't understand. Whether it was true love, I couldn't judge.

chunks.zh: @Lowlife 可以文雅一点吗🥲😅
chunks.en: @Lowlife Can you be a little more refined? 🥲😅

chunks.zh: 论迹不论心哦，法律上出轨都不能直接离婚也多分不了多少钱，所以男方要是婚内没出轨甚至净身出户，那我感觉并没有什么大问题。
chunks.en: Judge by actions, not intentions. Legally, cheating cannot directly lead to divorce and won't result in much more money, so if the man didn't cheat during the marriage or even left with nothing, I don't think there's a big problem.

chunks.zh: 至于是真爱还是就是馋年轻身子，其实都没啥差别。
chunks.en: As for whether it's true love or just lusting after a young body, there's not much difference.

chunks.zh: 大家的各种顾虑实际上是把婚姻这种社会行为过于神圣化了，这是目前国内结婚高昂成本和繁琐过程的结果，但是实际上真爱就不应该是对成本的考量。
chunks.en: Everyone's concerns are actually over-sanctifying marriage as a social behavior. This is the result of the high cost and cumbersome process of getting married in China, but in reality, true love shouldn't be a consideration of cost.

chunks.zh: 皇帝和嫔妃之间有真爱吗？
chunks.en: Is there true love between the emperor and his concubines?

chunks.zh: 净身出户 ？然后发现真爱消失了
chunks.en: Leaves with nothing? And then finds out the true love disappeared.

chunks.zh: 男的没什么真爱，女的看到你就湿就是真爱
chunks.en: Men don't have much true love, true love is when a woman sees you and gets wet.

chunks.zh: @superliy 那你运气不错。
chunks.en: @superliy Then you are lucky.

chunks.zh: 一般人对初恋会投入较多的真爱，结局和剧情走向都挺狗血的。
chunks.en: Generally, people invest more true love in their first love, and the ending and plot are quite cliche.

chunks.zh: 我个人觉得有道德感的男人，婚后也不会随便出轨。
chunks.en: I personally think that men with a sense of morality will not cheat casually after marriage.

chunks.zh: 娶个普通老婆，过平凡日子挺好，省心。
chunks.en: It's good to marry an ordinary wife and live an ordinary life, it saves you trouble.

chunks.zh: @alax234  血清素 只能维持 3-18 个月，那每 3-18 个月分手找新的 不就是永远寻找真爱中嘛
chunks.en: @alax234 Serotonin only lasts for 3-18 months, so breaking up and finding a new one every 3-18 months is just the same as always searching for true love.

chunks.zh: @thinkm 那啥，这两年不是很多桌球馆有很多年轻小妹陪打嘛，而且收费还不低，我就问身边喜欢去打的朋友是图个啥，回答说：因为年轻，就算到中年搞不动了，但是被一群年轻的小妹妹围着转也是件很开心的事情
chunks.en: @thinkm Well, haven't there been a lot of young girls accompanying people to play billiards in billiard halls in the past two years, and the fees are not low either. I asked my friends who like to play what they are looking for, and they replied: Because they are young, even if they can't get it up in middle age, it's still a very happy thing to be surrounded by a group of young girls.

chunks.zh: 真爱在你没遇到之前是理解不了的，就像二维生物永远理解不了三维时空。
chunks.en: True love cannot be understood until you encounter it, just like two-dimensional creatures can never understand three-dimensional space-time.

chunks.zh: 而且真爱是原子性的，有就是有，没有就是没有。
chunks.en: Moreover, true love is atomic, either it exists, or it doesn't.

chunks.zh: 并没有 50%真爱 这样的说法。
chunks.en: There is no such thing as 50% true love.

chunks.zh: 我觉得纯靠运气，大部分人一辈子也遇不到真爱。
chunks.en: I think it's purely based on luck, most people will never encounter true love in their lifetime.

chunks.zh: 因此公开讨论这个没啥意义。
chunks.en: Therefore, there is no point in discussing this publicly.

chunks.zh: 赞美真爱，同样赞美负责任的普爱关系。
chunks.en: Praise true love, and also praise responsible general love relationships.

chunks.zh: 好久没在 v2 发言了，今天发个吐槽。
chunks.en: I haven't spoken on v2 for a long time, so I'll post a rant today.

chunks.zh: 以前我也相信真爱，tmd ，当时根本不在意对方是一个 175 ，230 斤的胖子。
chunks.en: I used to believe in true love, tmd. At that time, I didn't care at all that the other party was a fat person who was 175cm and 230 pounds.

chunks.zh: 人家给我甩脸色我还以为是研究生压力太大，各种好吃好喝给他买游戏，组装电脑，甚至他和我说买婚房缺点钱，我也就直接转了，连让他打个欠条都没。
chunks.en: When they gave me a cold shoulder, I thought the pressure of graduate school was too great. I bought him all kinds of delicious food and drinks, bought him games, assembled a computer, and even when he told me that he was short of money to buy a wedding house, I directly transferred it to him without even asking him to write an IOU.

chunks.zh: 结果他研究生毕业，进了体制内，上岸第一剑先斩的我。
chunks.en: As a result, after he graduated from graduate school and entered the system, the first thing he did after getting ashore was to cut me down.

chunks.zh: 我还傻逼的以为是因为我对他不好，所以他要分手。
chunks.en: I was still stupid enough to think it was because I wasn't good to him that he wanted to break up.

chunks.zh: 结果人家反手拉黑我，欠的钱一点不还。
chunks.en: As a result, he blocked me and didn't pay back a penny of the money he owed.

chunks.zh: 真爱就是南师大的猪猪与烤鲍鱼
chunks.en: True love is the piglet and roasted abalone of Nanjing Normal University

chunks.zh: 刚开始的那几年肯定是你侬我侬，如胶似漆，干柴烈火
chunks.en: In the beginning, for those first few years it's definitely all sweet words, stuck together like glue, and full of passion.

chunks.zh: 然后才是你中有我我中有你
chunks.en: Then it's you in me and me in you.

chunks.zh: 之后是什么还没体验，有人说陪伴+习惯成自然+依赖，还没体验过
chunks.en: I haven't experienced what comes after that. Some people say companionship + habit becomes nature + dependence, but I haven't experienced it yet.
